GisIPolygon Class Reference

#include <IPolygon.h>

Inherits GisISurfaceAbstract.

Inheritance diagram for GisIPolygon:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisIPolygon class is a polygon Geometry type. GisIPolygon is defined by one exterior boundary and zero or more interior boundaries. Each of the boundaries must be a closed, simple LinearRing.

Definition at line 35 of file IPolygon.h.
